name: Birthday Cake (Yiren Wang)
description:
Birthday Cake

Prototype Studio Week 9 - A GAME THAT YOU WOULD RATHER WATCH THAN PLAY

This is a huge birthday cake, and you want to eat the strawberry on top of the cake. But the cream on the cake will fall on your face. Try to eat the strawberry without being covered with cream!

How to play

  • Turn on the camera on your computer
  • Move your head in front of the camera
  • Press R to restart
